name: Captain Dreadlocks' Crunchy Pirates
description:
Join Captain Dreadlocks and his crew of crunchy, smelly, hippy pirates as they attempt to rid the world of awful animal testing!

These pirates are Crunchy as defined by Urban Dictionary:

Used to describe persons who have adjusted or altered their lifestyle for environmental reasons. Crunchy persons tend to be politically strongly left-leaning and may be additionally but not exclusively categorized as vegetarians, vegans, eco-tarians, conservationists, environmentalists, neo-hippies, tree huggers, nature enthusiasts, etc. 

Made entirely in the Go programming language for the Butterscotch Shenanijam, this was the most my wife and I were able to pull off of our lofty idea in the span of two days. Save the rats from those horrible, nerdy scientists!

All images not made by my lovely wife are listed in a licenses.txt file in the assets folder of the download. I would have put them inside the game credits if I had time to make a game credits screen! :)
